text: Creed III is a 2023 American boxing movie directed by Steven Caple Jr.. It is the sequel to the 2018 movie Creed II and the ninth movie in the Rocky franchise. It stars Michael B. Jordan, Sylvester Stallone and Tessa Thompson. == Other websites == * * Category:2020s sports movies Category:2023 drama movies Category:American sports drama movies Category:Boxing movies Category:Rocky movies Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies produced by Ryan Coogler
title: Creed III
